micro

Summary

Lightweight text editor for the terminal.

Jots

Get at the micro command interface via C-e

Installing micro

Development is slow enough that your package manager probably has you covered. But it’s also a single executable file that you can install and run anywhere

curl https://getmic.ro | bash && mv micro ~/.local/bin

micro plugins I use

micro Filemanager plugin

 
> plugin install filemanager

Open a file tree in the current directory

> tree

micro LSP plugin

GitHub - AndCake/micro-plugin-lsp

Enables LSP methods as micro actions

Installing the micro LSP plugin

 
micro -plugin install lsp

Using the micro LSP plugin

Formats on save by default.

Keys Action
M-k summary
M-d definition
M-r references
C-SPC completion
note

C-q closes the defining file and returns you to your edit session
